summary: Four lazy friends try to woo a rich girl, in order to live a wealthy lifestyle. Their plan, however goes horribly wrong after they get embroiled with a notorious criminal.
cast: Sharman Joshi|Tusshar Kapoor|Kunal Khemu|Rajpal Yadav|Tanushree Dutta|Om Puri|Arbaaz Khan|Abhimanyu Singh|Payal Rohatgi|Murli Sharma|Tiku Talsania|Asrani|Farida Dadi|Rasika Joshi|Tarina Patel|Paresh Bramhbhatt|Shree Rammy Pandey|Bharat Veer
title: Dhol
